quote: We put about 20 handwritten letters in mailboxes... three people called me out of 20.
why_clipworthy: Shows a unique, actionable tactic for lead generation.
suggested_hook: Want to stand out in a competitive market? Try this old-school tactic.

quote: Come up with your own personal brand and run with it... it will get you clients.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to embrace their unique identity to attract clients.
suggested_hook: Your personal brand is your biggest asset in real estate.
